alt-description-of-the-measure: Mise en place d'une méthode de pilotage de l'irrigation
alt-comments-on-sustainability: Les méthodes de pilotage de l'irrigation ont pour objectif d'optimiser les apports d'eau par ha irrigué, sachant que la variabilité interannuelle des besoins en irrigation est de plus en plus importante. Il peut s'agir tout simplement de suivre des bulletins d'avertissement irrigation, jusqu'à la mise en oeuvre d'outils de mesures dans les parcelles irriguées (sondes tensiométriques, etc.).

name: Optimizing water suppliers through equipment
description-of-the-measure: Type of irrigation system to save water
comments-on-sustainability: The type of material used for irrigation can influence the water consumption per ha. Thus, drip type installations will allow greater efficiency of the water supplied than other irrigation systems.
alt-name: Optimiser les apports d'eau par le matériel
alt-description-of-the-measure: Evolution du matériel d'irrigation plus économe
alt-comments-on-sustainability: Le type de matériel utilisé pour l'irrigation peut influencer la consommation d'eau à l'ha. Ainsi, des installations de type goutte à goutte vont permettre une plus grande efficacité de l'eau apportée que les autres systèmes d'irrigation.

name: Develop irrigation
description-of-the-measure: Develop irrigation
comments-on-sustainability: In areas exposed to a sharp increase in the water deficit, the development of efficient irrigation (drip irrigation) will make it possible to stabilize the production potential of vines per hectare.
alt-description-of-the-measure: Développer l'irrigation
alt-comments-on-sustainability: Dans les territoires exposés à une forte hausse du déficit hyrique, le développement de l'irrigation efficiente (goutte à goutte) va permettre de stabiliser le potentiel de production des vignes à l'ha.

name: Irrigation of young plants
description-of-the-measure: Irrigation of young plants
comments-on-sustainability: Irrigation of young plants
alt-description-of-the-measure: Irrigation des plantiers
alt-comments-on-sustainability: L'irrigation peut être un levier de stabilisation du renouvellement des plantations en éviter la surmortalité les premières années lors de sécheresses trop sévères.

name: Exit irrigation
description-of-the-measure: Exit irrigation
comments-on-sustainability: A strategy of seeking added value (vinification and direct sale) can be deployed and thus face the decline in the productive potential of the vines.
alt-description-of-the-measure: Sortir de l'irrigation
alt-comments-on-sustainability: Une stratégie de recherche de valeur ajoutée (vinification et vente directe) peut être déployée et ainsi faire face à la baisse du potentiel productif des vignes.

name: Organic matter
description-of-the-measure: Organic matter
comments-on-sustainability: Contribution of organic residual products to strengthen soil fertility. Induced effects favorable to an increase in the soil water reserve are expected for better resistance to drought episodes.
alt-description-of-the-measure: Apport de PRO
alt-comments-on-sustainability: Apport de produits résiduaires organiques afin de renforcer la fertilité des sols. Des effets induits favorables à une augmentation de la réserve en eau du sol sont attendus pour une meilleure résistance aux épisodes sécheresse.

name: Inter-row grass cover
description-of-the-measure: Inter-row grass cover
comments-on-sustainability: Grassing of the inter row, whether temporary or permanent, will allow an increase in soil fertility and strengthen the soil's capacity to withstand episodes of drought, while providing protection against heavy rains synonymous with erosion and loss of fertility.
alt-description-of-the-measure: Enherbement des inter rangs
alt-comments-on-sustainability: L'enherbement de l'inter rang, qu'il soit temporaire ou permanent, va permettre un accroissement de la fertilité du sol et renforcer les capacités du sol à résister aux épisodes de sécherresses, tout en procurant une protection contre les fortes pluies synonymes d'érosion et de perte de fertilité.

name: Sheep grazing
description-of-the-measure: Sheep grazing
comments-on-sustainability: The maintenance of the grass cover by sheep herds will allow the return to the soil of livestock excrement which will help to strengthen the fertility of the soil.
alt-description-of-the-measure: Pâturage de brebis
alt-comments-on-sustainability: L'entretien de l'enherbement par des troupeaux ovins va permettre un retour au sol des déjections d'élevage qui vont concourir à renforcer la fertilité du sol.

name: Soil tillage reduction
description-of-the-measure: Soil tillage reduction
comments-on-sustainability: The reduction in tillage, in particular the depth of the worked horizon, will limit the degradation of the organic matter present.
alt-description-of-the-measure: Réduction du travail du sol
alt-comments-on-sustainability: La réduction du travail du sol, notamment de la profondeur de l'horizon travaillé, va limiter la dégradation de la matière organique présente.

name: Very shallow soil tillage
description-of-the-measure: Very shallow soil tillage
comments-on-sustainability: Tillage limited to a few cm of depth will be beneficial on the dynamics of organic matter and therefore on soil fertility.
alt-description-of-the-measure: Travail du sol très superifciel
alt-comments-on-sustainability: Un travail du sol limité à quelques cm de prondeur, voire l'absence totale de travail du sol, sera bénéfique sur la dynamique de matière organique et donc de la fertilité du sol.

name: Kaolinite spreading
description-of-the-measure: Kaolinite spreading
comments-on-sustainability: Adding kaolinite before a heat wave helps protect the plants from sunburn (clay film), and thus improves stomatal activity.
alt-description-of-the-measure: Apport de kaolinite
alt-comments-on-sustainability: Un apport de kaolinite avant un épisode de canicule permet de protéger la plantes des coups de soleil (film d'argile), et améliore ainsi l'activité stomatique.

name: Leaf management
description-of-the-measure: Leaf management
comments-on-sustainability: The management of the foliage will make it possible to limit the above-ground biomass with the idea of controlling the need for evapotranspiration of plants during periods of drought and heat waves.
alt-description-of-the-measure: Gestion du feuillage
alt-comments-on-sustainability: La gestion du feuillage va permettre de limiter la biomasse aérienne dans l'idée de maîtriser le besoin en évapotranspiration des plantes lors des périodes de sécheresse et canicules.

name: Frost fight
description-of-the-measure: Frost fight
comments-on-sustainability: There are many devices to fight against frost, the amount of which will be quite variable: heating candles, sprinkler, fan (fixed or mobile), helicopter, hot air convector, etc.
alt-description-of-the-measure: Lutte contre le gel
alt-comments-on-sustainability: De multiples dispositifs de lutte contre le gel existent dont le montant de l'investissement sera assez variable : bougies chauffantes, aspersion, brasseur d'air (fixe ou mobile), hélicoptèe, convecteur d'air chaud, etc.

name: Nets
description-of-the-measure: Nets
comments-on-sustainability: The installation of nets is a means of combating both the damage caused by hail but also hot spells during extreme temperatures.
alt-description-of-the-measure: Filets
alt-comments-on-sustainability: La mise en place de filets est un moyen de lutte à la fois contre les dégâts occasionées par la grêle mais aussi les coups de chaud lors de températures extrêmes.

name: Pruning
description-of-the-measure: Pruning
comments-on-sustainability: The purpose of pruning management may be to protect the clusters from direct sunlight by shading the leaves located higher.
alt-description-of-the-measure: Taille
alt-comments-on-sustainability: La gestion de la taille peut avoir pour finalité la protection des grappes d'un ensoleillement direct par ombrage des feuilles situées plus hauts.

name: Diversify grape varieties
description-of-the-measure: Diversify grape varieties
comments-on-sustainability: Introducing a variety of grape varieties will make it possible to distribute the climatic consequences in the event of hazards.
alt-description-of-the-measure: Diversifier les cépages
alt-comments-on-sustainability: Introduire une diversité de cépages permettra de répartir les conséquences climatiques en cas d'aléas.

name: Over-grafting
description-of-the-measure: Over-grafting
comments-on-sustainability: Over-grafting quickly made it possible to produce grape from a new grape variety on a plant already in production.
alt-description-of-the-measure: Surgreffage
alt-comments-on-sustainability: Le surgreffage a permettre rapidement de produire du raison à partir d'un nouveau cépage sur un plant déjà en place.

name: Introduce new grape varieties
description-of-the-measure: Introduce new grape varieties
comments-on-sustainability: Test and gradually introduce new grape varieties which will eventually be adapted to new local pdeoclimatic conditions
alt-description-of-the-measure: Introduire de nouveau cépages
alt-comments-on-sustainability: Tester et introduire progressivement de nouveaux cépages qui seront à terme adapté aux nouvelles conditions pdéoclimatiques locales.

name: Reorganize the plantations
description-of-the-measure: Reorganize the plantations
comments-on-sustainability: Consider a diversification of the types of plantations in space (orientation, slopes, density, type of size, etc.) to maximize the potential of the territory's micro climates.
alt-2nd-weather-event-season-or-period: Envisager une diversification des types de plantations dans l'espace (orientation, pentes, densité, type de taille, etc.) pour maximiser les potentialités des micro climats du territoire.
alt-description-of-the-measure: Réorganiser les plantations
alt-comments-on-sustainability: Envisager une diversification des types de plantations dans l'espace (orientation, pentes, densité, type de taille, etc.) pour maximiser les potentialités des micro climats du territoire.

name: Keyline design
description-of-the-measure: Keyline design
comments-on-sustainability: The Keyline design technique consists of favoring the infiltration of water into the soil to make it circulate as long as possible from tillage taking into account the level lines. It will then be possible to connect these keylines to watering points which will thus be naturally filled during rainy episodes.
alt-description-of-the-measure: Keyline design
alt-comments-on-sustainability: La technique de Keyline design consiste à favoriser l'infiltration de l'eau dans le sol pour la faire circuler le plus longtemps possible à partir d'un travail du sol tenant compte des lignes de niveaux. Il sera alors possible de connecter ces keyline à des points d'abreuvement qui seront ainsi naturellement rempli lors des épisodes pluvieux.

name: Increase the number of fodder crops
description-of-the-measure: Securing enough fodder reserves based on different species harvested at different period of the season
comments-on-sustainability: Greater frequency of fodder deficit imply to secure the fodder production of the farm. Thus, it is important to grow different fodder crops and get several type of harvest
alt-description-of-the-measure: Erinevate söödakultuure  kasvatamine ja erinevate söötade (hein, rohusilo, maisisilo jt) valmistamine.
alt-comments-on-sustainability: Söödadefitsiidi suurem sagedus tähendab farmis söödatootmise kindlustamist. Seega on oluline kasvatada erinevaid söödakultuure ja valmistada erinevaid söötasid (hein, rohusilo, maisisilo jt).

name: Use rotational grazing
description-of-the-measure: Design of rotational management plan based on recovery time of grasslands
comments-on-sustainability: Rotational grazing is positive on soil and grassland production. Increases grass availability during drought periods.
alt-description-of-the-measure: Rotatsioonilise karjatamise puhul on rohumaa jaotatud kopliteks, kus loomi hoitakse lühikese aja jooksul.
alt-comments-on-sustainability: Rotatsiooniline karjatamine on positiivne mullaviljakusele ja rohutagavara tagamisele. Suurendab rohu saagikust põuaperioodidel.

name: Cooling/ventilation  systems in animal buildings
description-of-the-measure: Due to high temperature, cooling and/or ventilation systems are required to preserve animal performance
comments-on-sustainability: Exposure to a high temperature–humidity index can effect milk production and quality, mortality, reproductive health and disease susceptibility, especially in intensive dairy cattle. Investments are needed, increased energy consumption.
alt-description-of-the-measure: Ventilaatorite ja/või veepihustite ostmine ja paigaldamine loomakasvatushoonetesse, et vältida loomadel kuumastressi teket.
alt-comments-on-sustainability: Kõrge temperatuuri/niiskuse indeks võib eriti intensiivtootmise piimakarja puhul mõjutada piimatoodangut ja kvaliteeti, suremust, reproduktiivtervist ning vastuvõtlikkust haigustele

name: Providing natural or artificial shelters to outdoor animals
description-of-the-measure: Using trees as natural shadow or building light constructions to protect the animals from adverse weather
comments-on-sustainability: Animal welfare, health and performance are improved. Requires some cost of setting up shelters.
alt-name: Looduslike või tehislike varjualuste kasutamine karjamaadel
alt-description-of-the-measure: Looduslike ja/või tehislike varjualuste rajamine karjamaadele.
alt-comments-on-sustainability: Paraneb loomade heaolu, tervis ja jõudlusnäitajad. Varjualuste rajamisega kaasnevad majanduslikud kulud.

name: Adjust the mean annual animal stocking density to the herbage growth potential
description-of-the-measure: Changes in the grass production cycle, earlier growth in spring, decline in summer, longer growing period in autumn.
comments-on-sustainability: Reduction of grass growth during drought periods in summer, increased risk of overgrazing. Using fodder reserves to feed the animals
alt-name: Karjatamiskoormuse muutmine vastavalt rohu kasvu intensiivsusele
alt-description-of-the-measure: Karjatamiskoormuse muutmine sõltuvalt rohu kasvu- ja taastumiskiirusest.
alt-comments-on-sustainability: Rohu kasvu aeglustumine põuaperioodidel, suurenenud ülekarjatamise oht. Söödavarude kasutamine või loomade arvu vähendamine.

name: Upgrade biosecurity measures
description-of-the-measure: Set of measures to protect animals from emerging zoonooses, diseases and their vectors
comments-on-sustainability: Animal welfare, health and performance are improved. Requires some cost of materials and setting up the specific measures.
alt-description-of-the-measure: Meetmed, mille kaudu hoitakse ära patogeenide sissetoomine karja, mis võiks mõjutada karja tervist ja heaolu
alt-comments-on-sustainability: Parandatakse loomade heaolu, tervist ja jõudlust. Nõuab teatud kulusid materjalidele ja konkreetsete meetmete rakendamiseks.

name: Improvement of soil drainage
description-of-the-measure: Restoring or istalling new soil drainage systems to avoid flooded land after heavy rains
comments-on-sustainability: Drainage systems are very expensive to install but their short and long term benefits generally outweigh their initial cost if they are well maintained.
alt-description-of-the-measure: Maaparandussüsteemide uuendamine, rajamine ja pidev hooldamine põllumajandusmaa viljelusväärtuse suurendamiseks.
alt-comments-on-sustainability: Maaparandussüsteemide paigaldamine on väga kallis, kuid pikemas perspektiivis on investeeringutel väga positiivne mõju kogu tootmissüsteemile. Süsteemide hooldamine on pikaajaline protsess.

name: Increase feed reserves and storage capacity
description-of-the-measure: Need for the higher security feed stock for the animals
comments-on-sustainability: Ensures animal welfare, health and performance during drought. Additional costs will be needed to expand feed storage and / or maintain larger feed volumes.
alt-description-of-the-measure: Mitmesuguste koresöötade valmistamine ja säilitamine, et tagada loomadele piisav söödakogus pikematel põuaperioodidel.
alt-comments-on-sustainability: Tagab loomade heaolu, tervise ja jõudluse ka põuaperioodil. Vajalikud on lisakulutused söödahoidlate laiendamiseks ja/või suurema söödakoguse säilitamiseks.

name: High-moisture cereal conservation for animal feed
description-of-the-measure: Conservation of high-moisture cereals with either biological or acidic silage additives
comments-on-sustainability: Allows earlier harvest, avoiding difficulties associated with wet harvesting period. Reduces energy cost as no need to dry the grain
alt-description-of-the-measure: Niiske teravilja konserveerimine kas bioloogiliste või happeliste silokindlustuslisanditega
alt-comments-on-sustainability: Võimaldab koristada saaki, vähendades vihmase koristamisperioodiga seotud probleeme. Väheneb energiakulu, kuna vilja pole vaja kuivatada.

name: Install backup power generator
description-of-the-measure: Install disel power generators to protect animal welfare and health during the power cuts
comments-on-sustainability: Animal welfare, health and performance are secured when power failures occure to to extreme storms. Back-up generators are a livestock lifesaver, but need investments.
alt-description-of-the-measure: Piisava võimsusega varugeneraatori soetamine, paigaldamine ja hooldamine.
alt-comments-on-sustainability: Loomade heaolu, tervis ja jõudlus on tagatud, kui äärmuslike tormide korral tekivad elektrikatkestused. Varugeneraatori soetamiseks ja hoolduseks on vajalikud lisakulutused.

name: Making and using Herd Health Plan
description-of-the-measure:
The plan should include good husbandry practices (with regards to housing, climate, water/feeding
and management)
comments-on-sustainability: Animal welfare, health and performance are improved. Requires some cost of materials and setting up the specific measures. Needs veterinary consultation and surveillance
alt-description-of-the-measure: Praktiliste meetmete plaan, mille eesmärk on ennetada haigusi ning suurendada loomade üldist heaolu ja tervist.
alt-comments-on-sustainability: Parandatakse loomade heaolu, tervist ja jõudlust. Nõuab teatud kulusid materjalidele ja konkreetsete meetmete rakendamiseks. Vajalik on veterinaarne nõustamine ja pidev seire.

name: Use of varieties from southern areas adapted to local climate conditions
description-of-the-measure: Use of varieties from areas with similar conditions
comments-on-sustainability: Some foreign varieties coming from other geographical areas with similar or more stressing conditions can sometimes adapt to new areas with more favourable conditions
alt-name: Uute sortide kasutuselevõtt: lõunapoolsetes piirkondades seni kasvatatud sordid
alt-description-of-the-measure: Uute sortide kasutuselevõtuga on võimalik saada paremat saagi kvaliteeti
alt-comments-on-sustainability: Mõned välismaised sordid, mis on pärit sarnaste tingimuste või suurema kliimastressiga piirkonnast, võivad mõnikord kohaneda uutes piirkondades, kus kasvutingimused on soodsamad.

name: Supplementary irrigation
description-of-the-measure: Use of the most efficient system (drip irrigation). Delivers right amount , in the right place, at the right time
comments-on-sustainability: Water may be a scarce resource in the future. Using wisely water is also beneficial for a good plant health
alt-description-of-the-measure: Effektiivse kastmissüsteemi (tilkkastmine) kasutamine võimaldab kasta/väetada optimaalsel ajal ja koguses
alt-comments-on-sustainability: Veeressursid võivad tulevikus väheneda. Vee tõhusam kasutamine on kasulik ka taimede tervise seisukohast.

name: Composting of organic material
description-of-the-measure: Composting organic material such as straw, clover grass or manure before applying it on the field.
comments-on-sustainability: Compost supplies the soil life with food, which increases the humus content and therefore the storage of CO2. Organic material enables the soil to absorb more water from (heavy) rainfall and to store it longer in the soil during drought periods. Humus also stabilises the soil, decreases soil erosion and leaching of nutrients into the ground and surface water. Yields are stabilised over time. Composting creates more work load.
alt-description-of-the-measure: Orgaanilise materjali  (põhu, ristiku, sõnniku vms) komposteerimine enne põllule laotamist.
alt-comments-on-sustainability: Kompost varustab mullaelustikku toitainetega, mis suurendab huumusesisaldust ja süsiniku sidumist. Orgaaniline aine parandab mulla veesidumisvõimet ja suurendab mulla vastupidavust põuale. Huumus stabiliseerib mulda, vähendab mulla erosiooni ja toitainete leostumist pinnasesse ja pinnavette. Saagid stabiliseeruvad aja jooksul. Kompostimine suurendab tööjõukulu.

name: Reduced tillage between the rows
description-of-the-measure: Conservation tillage (e.g. reduced tillage, mulch seeding) to avoid the turning of the soil.
comments-on-sustainability: A reduced soil management improves the soil structure (better water infiltration and water keeping), protects the soil, decreases soil erosion and  leaching of nutrients into the ground and surface water. Less field crossings are necessary so less working hours and less fuel is needed. Initial investments are maybe needed or the use of subcontractor services.
alt-description-of-the-measure: Klassikaline maaharimisviisi asendamine minimeeritud harimisega (nt vähendatud mullaharimine, multšimine).
alt-comments-on-sustainability: Minimeeritud harimine parandab mulla struktuuri (parem veesidumis- ja hoiuvõime), kaitseb mulda, vähendab mulla erosiooni ning toitainete leostumist põhja- ja pinnavette. Minimeeritud harimine tähendab vähem töötunde ja väiksemat kütusekulu. Vajalikud alginvesteeringud või teenusepakkujate kasutamine.

name: Optimal nutrient supply
description-of-the-measure: Optimised nutrient supply of the plants with main nutrients and micro nutrients
comments-on-sustainability: Only optimally nourished plants are stable, healthy and are more resilient to the effects of climate change. An adapted fertilisation avoids leaching of nutrients into ground and surface water, which would affect flora and fauna negatively. GHG and ammonia emissions are reduced and soil organisms can profit from an optimal nutrient supply (including lime). This measure can help to reduce the amount of fertilisation.
alt-description-of-the-measure: Taimede optimaalne toitainete varustamine peamiste ja mikroelementidega
alt-comments-on-sustainability: Toitainetega optimaalselt varustatud taimed on stabiilsed, terved ja vastupidavad kliimamuutuste mõjudele. Optimaalne väetamine väldib toitainete leostumist põhja- ja pinnavette, mis mõjutaks taimestikku ja loomastikku negatiivselt. Vähenevad kasvuhoonegaaside ja ammoniaagi emissioonid ning see (sh lupjamine) on ka mullaorganismidele kasulik. See meede võib vähendada väetisekulu.

name: Protection against hail and heavy precipitation
description-of-the-measure: Installing nets and foil roofs against hail, frost, heavy precipitation and radiation
comments-on-sustainability: The protection devices need some investments but the benefit, especially against hail, is very high. A further side effect is the protection from bird and wasp feeding.  The product quality can be improved considerably.
alt-description-of-the-measure: Võrkude ja kilekatete paigaldamine rahe, külma, tugevate sademete ja radiatsiooni vastu
alt-comments-on-sustainability: Kaitserajatised ja -materjalid nõuavad teatavaid investeeringuid, kuid kasu, eriti rahe eest, on väga suur. Katted vähendavd ka lindude või herilaste poolt tekitatud kahjusid. Saagi kvaliteeti saab seeläbi märkimisväärselt parandada.

name: Use of agricultural information services and professional advisor
description-of-the-measure: To cope with climate change,diverse external agricultural information services are used
comments-on-sustainability: The advice for sustainable adaptation measures ideally has positive synergy effects (e.g. lower GHG emissions, improved soil infiltration, stabilised yields). At the same time, the farmer has to have a good understanding of his own production system and observe it well. External advice is necessary.
alt-description-of-the-measure: Asjaliku nõustamisteenuse kasutamine aitab kaasa optimaalsete kasvatustehnoloogiate valimisele
alt-comments-on-sustainability: Nõustamisteenuse kasutamisel on ideaalis positiivne sünergiline ja mõju (nt vähenevad kasvuhoonegaaside heitkogused, paraneb mulla veesidumisvõime, saagikus stabiliseerub). Samal ajal peab tootjatel olema hea ülevaade oma tootmissüsteemist, mis vajab pidevat jägimist ja kohandamist. Nõustamine on sisseostetav teenus

name: Frost protection candles
description-of-the-measure: Frost protection candles are implemented in the driving lanes to avoid a temperature decrease  < 0°C
comments-on-sustainability: The use of frost protection candles is very expensive and leads to increasing GHG emissions and to a reduced air quality.
alt-name: Küünalde põletamine istanduses öökülma kahjude kaitseks
alt-description-of-the-measure: Küünlad paigaldatakse reavahedesse, et vältida temperatuuri langust <0 ° C
alt-comments-on-sustainability: Küünalde põletamine öökülmade kaitseks on väga kallis ning põhjustab kasvuhoonegaaside heitkoguste kasvu ja õhukvaliteedi halvenemist.

name: Foliar fertilization
description-of-the-measure: To ensure nutrient uptake during drought periods, a leaf fertilisation should take place
comments-on-sustainability: The possibility of supporting plants with nutrients by a leaf fertilisation, even during drought periods, has positive consequences on the yields and the quality of the fruits.
alt-description-of-the-measure: Põuatingimustes on toiteainete omastamine lehtede kaudu pritsimisel lihtsam
alt-comments-on-sustainability: Lehtede väetamise kaudu on võimalik taimi toitainetega varustada ka põuaperioodidel. Mõjub positiivselt viljade saagikuse ja kvaliteedile

name: Optimize growth regulators and -stimulators
description-of-the-measure: Contingency processing to maintain the optimal growth stage, improve tillering and strengthen crop stand
comments-on-sustainability: Extreme weather events are expected to became increasingly intensive and frequent
alt-description-of-the-measure: Ettevaatusabinõu, et säilitada optimaalne kasvufaas, parandada võrsumist ja tugevdada kõrt
alt-comments-on-sustainability: Ekstreemsed ilmastikunähtused sagenevad ja intensiivistuvad.

name: Conversion to organic farm-system
description-of-the-measure: Includes obligatory measures which are positive for the adaptation in all farming systems
comments-on-sustainability: Smaller yield, but less inputs and investments
alt-description-of-the-measure: Teatud meetmete rakendamine, mille eesmärk peaks olema jätkusuutlikkuse suurendamine
alt-comments-on-sustainability: Väiksem saak, kuid vähem sisendeid ja investeeringuvajadust

name: Change crop rotation to ensure longer soil cover
description-of-the-measure: More winter crops, shorter fallow period, introduction of catch- and covercrops
comments-on-sustainability: Potentially more workload. Minimized soil erosion, improved carbon and nutrient storage
alt-description-of-the-measure: Rõhuasetus talikultuuridel, lühem pinnakatteta periood, lisada suviseid või talviseid vahekulture v ristikut
alt-comments-on-sustainability: Suurem töökoormus, kuid vähem erosiooni, paranenud mulla süsiniku- ja toitainetevaru

name: Expansion of crop rotation
description-of-the-measure: Diversification of crop rotation (4-5 crops), cultivating different varieties
comments-on-sustainability: Mitigation of risks, improved soil fertility, less fertilizers and pesticides lead to better management
alt-description-of-the-measure: Erinevate sortide/kultuuride kasvatamine (4-5 kultuuri), mitte piirduda ühe tulukultuuriga
alt-comments-on-sustainability: Riskide hajutamine läbi külvikorra mitmekesistamise parandab mullaviljakust ja vähendab väetise- ja pestitsiidide vajadust

name: Planning crops to optimize harvesting sequence
description-of-the-measure: Planning the crop rotation to conform with expected weather conditions
comments-on-sustainability: Avoiding harvesting overlaps to secure smooth process and availability of fallows for winter crops
alt-description-of-the-measure: Külvikordade uuendamine või parandamine, et see vastaks oodatavatele ilmastikutingimustele
alt-comments-on-sustainability: Koristusaegse soodsa ilmastiku ärakasutamiseks, et tagada sujuv protsess ja optimeerida ressursside kasutust

name: Preparedness for earlier application of crop protection
description-of-the-measure: Earlier dispersion of flying insect pests. Manipulating the planting dates.
comments-on-sustainability: Earlier application of crop protection could lead to increasing number of treatments and higher cumulative residue levels; Potentially, non-target organisms affected by pesticides
alt-description-of-the-measure: Lendavate putukkahjurite ja vektorhaiguste  varasem levimine eeldab valmisolekut taimekaitse rakendamiseks.
alt-comments-on-sustainability: Varasem taimekaitse rakendamine võib viia töötluste arvu suurendamiseni ja TKV jääkide kuhjumiseni; Võimalik ebasoodne mõju mittesihtorganismidele

name: Planting date adjustments in order to increase yields
description-of-the-measure: Early sowing of varieties with greater thermal time requirements so as to maximize production benefits
comments-on-sustainability: Reduce the period with no soil cover, increase production benefits, better use of early season soil moisture
alt-description-of-the-measure: Pikema kasvu ajaga sortide varasem külv, pidades silmas ka kevadiste öökülmade ohtu.
alt-comments-on-sustainability: Pinnakatteta perioodi lühenemine, tootmiseeliste ärakasutamine, varakevadise niiskuse kasutamine

name: Mixed-crop-cultivation
description-of-the-measure: Mixtures of crops like oat/pea, summerwheat/flax…
comments-on-sustainability: Less risk because of two crops with different vulnerabilities, positive for soil-life.
alt-description-of-the-measure: Segaviljade kasvatamine, nt. kaer/hernes, suvinisu/lina…
alt-comments-on-sustainability: Riskide maandamine, kuna erinevatel kultuuridel on erinev haavatavus; positiivne mullaelustikule.

name: Introduction of new cultivated species, improved varieties of crops and new technologies
description-of-the-measure: Shift in selection of crops, incl. the range of current crops will move northward
comments-on-sustainability: New species/varieties adapted to new conditions, reduced management costs; more diverse local production on the local market.
alt-name: Uute liikide, parandatud sortide ja uute tehnoloogiate kasutuselevõtt
alt-description-of-the-measure: Kultuuride muutunud valik, sh lõunapoolsemate kultuuride kasvatamine
alt-comments-on-sustainability: Uued liigid, mis sobivad kasvatamiseks muutunud tingimustes; väiksemad hoolduskulud; kohalikul turul mitmekesisem toodang

name: Cultivation of varieties/breeds optimal for local conditions; (participation in testing or selection for suitability of cultivars/breeds)
description-of-the-measure: Selection of new varieties and breeds suitable for new conditions and to preserve crop diversity.
comments-on-sustainability: The producer less vulnerable to climatic impact, hence competitive as a rural entrepeneur Developing first hand knowledge on what is suitable for the local conditions
alt-description-of-the-measure: Kohalike sortide ja tõugude kohasuse muutmine tingib vajaduse uute sortide ja tõugude järele
alt-comments-on-sustainability: Tootja haavatavus väheneb, seega ettevõtjana konkurentsivõimelisem; oskusteabe loomine kohalikesse tingimustesse kohaste sortide kohta

name: Improvement of seed bank stocks
description-of-the-measure: Improve and update bank seeds to ensure sufficient stock of crops and land races
comments-on-sustainability: May need investments
alt-description-of-the-measure: Seemnetagavara loomine, selle parandamine ja värskendamine, et tagada piisav kultuuride seemnevaru
alt-comments-on-sustainability: Võib eeldada investeeringusuutlikkust

name: Invest into stabile varieties in order to maintain yields
description-of-the-measure: Selection of cultivars that provide the yield withinthe  local variation of conditions
comments-on-sustainability: Instead of maximizing the yield, the stabile crop secures the risks in diverse conditions
alt-name: Stabiilsete sortide valik, et saagikust säilitada
alt-description-of-the-measure: Teatud sordid on teistest stabiilsemad
alt-comments-on-sustainability: Saagi maksimeerimise asemel, mis eeldab suuremaid sisendeid, võtta sihiks saagi stabiilsus erinevates ilmastikutingimustes

name: Application of site-specific agrotechnology
description-of-the-measure: Transition to precision agriculture; regulate agrotechnological processes by local conditions
comments-on-sustainability: Escape overuse of standard solutions and consequent adverse effects, increasing  investment requirements
alt-description-of-the-measure: Põllu tingimuste tundmaõppimine, üleminek täppisviljelusele
alt-comments-on-sustainability: Tüüplahenduste ja neist tingitud negatiivsete tagajärgede vältimine; Suur investeeringuvajadus

name: Year-round soil cover
description-of-the-measure: Soil cover throughout the whole year (with catch crops, nurse crops, straw mulch)
comments-on-sustainability: Positve GHG and groundwater as soil is not left bare and carbon is stored in the plants; Potential habitat created for wildlife, especially in winter
alt-description-of-the-measure: Aastaringne taimkate mullapinnal (vahekultuurid, allakülvid, põhumultš vms)
alt-comments-on-sustainability: Posiitvne GHG ja mullaveele, sest muld ei jää paljaks ja süsinik ladestub taimedes; looduslikule mitmekesisusele hea, kuna luuakse elupaiku

name: Green manure fallows
description-of-the-measure: Green manure fallows are used to improve soil and secure availability of fields prepared for seeding in time
comments-on-sustainability: Higher quality and quantity of the crop the next coming seasons should be sufficient to compensate for the loss of profit during the season
alt-description-of-the-measure: Haljaskesad parandavad mullakvaliteeti ja paindlikkust, et oleks õigeaegselt võtta külvivalmis maa.
alt-comments-on-sustainability: Tulevaste aastate kultuuride saagikuse ja kvaliteedi kasv võib korvata käesoleva hooaja kasumi puudumise
